nodes.text: LucasArts Update was a recurring department by Sue Seserman in the early issues of Star Wars Insider that discussed new and upcoming games from LucasArts. It appeared in issues 23-28.
Star Wars Insider 27: "Excerpts from the Journal of a Rebel Pilot"

The article served to promote the forthcoming LucasArts game Star Wars: Rebel Assault II: The Hidden Empire and featured journal extracts from the game's player character, Rookie One, revealing some background to the game's plot.
